snippet: Former Stockton Mayor Anthony Silva was arrested Sunday at the San Francisco International Airport, where he arrived from a vacation in South America, his attorney said....

headline.main: In Season Openers, the Red Bulls Rally and New York City F.C. Falls Short
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Rally to Win Season Opener

lead_paragraph: Former Stockton Mayor Anthony Silva was arrested Sunday at the San Francisco International Airport, where he arrived from a vacation in South America, his attorney said.
